id.description: The (per country) unique identifier of the airspace.

country.description: The country this airspace belongs to, as ISO Alpha-2 country code.

class.description: The class of the airspace as defined in the country specific class definition.

description.description: The airspaces description. Markdown is allowed.

boundary.description: The boundary polygon of the airspace.

top.description: The top boundary of the airspace.

bottom.description: The bottom boundary of the airspace.
